General.Name: Shaanxi Heimao Coking Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Heimao Coking Co., Ltd. operates as a coking company in China. The company offers coke, methanol, crude benzene, coal tar, synthetic ammonia, and fly ash autoclaved bricks. Shaanxi Heimao Coking Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Hancheng, China.
General.Address: Longmen Coal Chemical Industrial Park, Hancheng, China, 714000
